Job Title: Senior Offensive Duty Officer (SODO)

Location: Hurlburt Field, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Management, Other

Description:
Description

ARETUM, a leading government contracting company specializing in technology-enabled mission support services, is seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Offensive Duty Officer (SODO) to join our team. As a Senior Offensive Duty Officer at ARETUM, you will play a critical role in identifying and mitigating cyber threats and vulnerabilities through offensive security operations.

ARETUM is known for providing cutting-edge solutions and outstanding service to Federal clients in various sectors, including Next Generation Analytics, Engineering Services, Training Services, IT Systems, Cyber Security, PMO Support, and Financial Consulting. Our mission is to deliver technology-driven solutions that meet the unique needs of our government clients, enabling them to achieve their objectives effectively and efficiently.

Responsibilities

Conduct offensive security operations to identify and assess cyber threats and vulnerabilities.Shall be required to attend planning conferences as the AOC RC representative. May be tasked as the LNO at forward exercise locations to support the AOC RC.Perform penetration testing and vulnerability assessments on networks, systems, and applications.Analyze and interpret security data and reports to identify potential risks and develop appropriate mitigation strategies.Develop and maintain technical documentation, including testing plans, reports, and recommendations for remediation.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement and monitor security controls and measures.Stay updated on emerging threats, vulnerabilities, and industry best practices in offensive security operations.Provide guidance and support to junior team members regarding offensive security techniques and methodologies.

Requirements

Must possess Active Top Secret ClearanceBachelor’s degree required. Master’s degree preferred.NAF-level experience required; AFFOR, MAJCOM Staff experience desired.Must possess 5 years minimum, broken down as follows: Minimum of 3 years progressive AOC experience working as a Combat Operations Duty Officer (examples— FDO, SEAD DO, TCT Chief, Interdiction DO, CAS DO) and culminating as SODO or CCO.Plus a minimum of 2 years as Offensive Operations Team Mentor, Offensive Operations White Cell member or AOC Combat Ops Instructor.Must possess 5 years’ experience working with AOD, ATO, ACO and SPINS.Must possess 5 years total experience working with operational level Air Power Command and Control Systems (US or allied); a minimum of 3 yearsExperience working with TBMCS.Participation in a minimum of 5 AOC exercises or large scale AOC experiments or Joint training events employing over 250 simulated airpower sorties per day in any of the following duty positions: CCO, SODO, SODO Mentor, or AOC white cell/Replication cell working with an AOC Offensive Operations cell (M). Experience as an exercise designer/planner /director (HD).Participation in two or more AOC/Joint exercises as SADO or SADO Mentor OR participation as SADO as part of an AOC white or Replication cell (M). Experience as an exercise designer/planner /director (HD).Ability to use Microsoft Office, Adobe Pro required.

ARETUM is an equal opportunity employer, committed to diversity and inclusion. All qualified candidates will receive equal consideration for employment without regard to disability, race, color, religious creed, national origin, sexual orientation/gender identity, or age.

ARETUM utilizes e-Verify to check employment authorization.

EEO/AA/F/M/Vet/Disabled.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
